Detailed Description

Advise others that a component is gone.

string ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getContextEventDescription (   ) 
 

annotated, stringified event information.

Returns:
an arbitrary string.

Implements ccaffeine.ce.ContextEvent.

long ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getContextEventSequenceNumber (   ) 
 

For each source:key pair events are emitted in a monotonically increasing sequence.

It is hoped 64 bits is enough to handle long runs.

Implements ccaffeine.ce.ContextEvent.

gov.cca.ComponentID ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getContextEventSourceID (   ) 
 

Fetch the component generating the event.

Returns:
the componentID of the component generating the event, or null if the container itself generated the event.

Implements ccaffeine.ce.ContextEvent.

int ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getContextEventSourceKey (   ) 
 

Within a source component, there may be more than one emitter.

Key is the self-proclaimed serial number of the emitter, unique within the scope of the result from getSourceID.

Implements ccaffeine.ce.ContextEvent.

ContextEventType ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getContextEventType (   ) 
 

Returns the integer standard type for the event.

If the event is not one of the standard types, then this returns ContextEventType.NONE. For ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent, the type is ComponentDeleted.

Implements ccaffeine.ce.ContextEvent.

string ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getDeadComponentClassName (   ) 
 

Returns:
class of deleted component.

string ccaffeine.ce.ComponentInstanceDeletedEvent.getDeadComponentInstanceName (   ) 
 

Returns:
name of deleted component.
